english.segment1: When I left home to be who I am. Some people said "No Way". But I laid it all down, gave everything. In my head rang the words that my father said
english.segment2: You're never far. I will be where you are. and when you come to me. I will open my arms
english.segment3: Welcome Home, you. I know you by name. How do you do?. I shine because of you today. So come and sit down. Tell me how you are. I know son, it's good just to see your face.
english.segment4: When I look at you holding my heart. I will give to you all that I have. Son I know there'll be times. You will feel all alone. I will share with you the words my father said
english.segment5: You're never far. I will be where you are. and when you come to me. You can bet I will open my arms
english.segment6: Welcome Home, you. I know you by name. How do you do?. I shine because of you today. So come and sit down. Tell me how you are. I know son, it's good just to see your face
english.segment7: Said I've been waiting for that day. Just to feel your warm embrace. Your love has shown. I will never be alone. You will welcome me home
english.segment8: I'll forever be. You will say to me. Welcome Home, you. I know you by name. How do you do?. I shine because of you today. So come and sit down. Tell me how you are. I know son, it's good just to see your face
english.segment9: When I left home to be who I am. Some people said "No Way"
